title: Entangle

properties.name: description
properties.value: Entangle is a members-only spell that requires level 79 Magic to cast. Casting Entangle will hold your target in place for 24 ticks (14.4 seconds) and grants 89 Magic experience (in addition to 2 xp per damage dealt). A successful hit, without any damage boosting items, can deal up to 5 damage. Players can increase the binding duration by equipping swampbark armour; each piece will increase the duration by 0.6 seconds, up to a maximum of 17.4 seconds.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Entangle
Entangle
Released 29 March 2004 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 79
Spellbook Standard
Type Combat
Experience 89 (70 in PVP if splash)"(70inPVPifsplash)" can not be assigned to a declared number type with value 89.
Damage 5
Runes 5 5 4
Casting speed 5 ticks
Description Holds your opponent for 15 seconds
Animation
Sound Effect

Entangle is a members-only spell that requires level 79 Magic to cast. Casting Entangle will hold your target in place for 24 ticks (14.4 seconds) and grants 89 Magic experience (in addition to 2 xp per damage dealt). A successful hit, without any damage boosting items, can deal up to 5 damage. Players can increase the binding duration by equipping swampbark armour; each piece will increase the duration by 0.6 seconds, up to a maximum of 17.4 seconds.

Once the spell wears off, the target has 5 ticks (3 seconds) of immunity before they can be entangled again.

In PvP, splashes give only 70 xp, but in PvM they give the full 89 xp.

Entangle is a stronger version of the level 20 spell Bind and the level 50 spell Snare.

[[File:Entangle icon (mobile).png|left]]
'''Entangle''' is a members-only [[spell]] that requires level 79 [[Magic]] to cast. Casting Entangle will hold your target in place for 24 [[ticks]] (14.4 seconds) and grants 89 Magic experience (in addition to 2 xp per damage dealt). A successful hit, without any damage boosting items, can deal up to 5 damage. Players can increase the binding duration by equipping [[swampbark armour]]; each piece will increase the duration by 0.6 seconds, up to a maximum of 17.4 seconds.

Once the spell wears off, the target has 5 ticks (3 seconds) of immunity before they can be entangled again.

In PvP, splashes give only 70 xp, but in PvM they give the full 89 xp.

Entangle is a stronger version of the level 20 spell [[Bind]] and the level 50 spell [[Snare]].
